snippet.title: Jewellery Sales under Lens of Tax Authorities amid Crackdown on Black Money

localized.description:
Demonetisation: Gold and jewellery sales done on November 8 are under lens of tax authorities amid crackdown on black money. A jeweller sold out gold worth Rs 600 crores on the day demonetisation announced by PM Modi.
